name: hotel-booking-app
description: Hotel Booking Application with Client and Server

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.start:test: concurrently "npm run start:test --prefix apps/server" "npm run start:test --prefix apps/client"
scripts.clean: find apps -name '*.js' -path '*/src/*' -delete && find apps -name '*.d.ts' -path '*/src/*' -delete && find apps -name '*.js.map' -path '*/src/*' -delete && find apps -name '*.d.ts.map' -path '*/src/*' -delete && find apps -name '*.cy.js' -delete && find apps -name '*.cy.js.map' -delete && find apps -name '*.js' -path '*/cypress/*' -delete && find apps -name '*.js.map' -path '*/cypress/*' -delete && find apps -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -delete && rm -rf apps/client/dist apps/server/dist apps/client/node_modules/.tmp apps/server/node_modules/.tmp
